abstract: Richard D. Parsons is stepping down as chairman of the bank and will be replaced by Michael E. O’Neill, another Citi board member and the former chief executive of the Bank of Hawaii.
snippet: Richard D. Parsons is stepping down as chairman of the bank and will be replaced by Michael E. O’Neill, another Citi board member and the former chief executive of the Bank of Hawaii.

headline.main: With Citigroup Stabilized, Parsons Decides to Retire

byline.original: By Michael J. de la Merced
